ModMetaData.name: Xenotype followers
ModMetaData.author: Bowa
ModMetaData.description:
This mod enables you to configure what Xenotypes might join you when performing a ritual with the random recruit reward. It supports all modded Xenotypes and all your custom created Xenotypes.
If you add more than one Xenotype to the list there is an even chance for any of them to spawn.
Note that this does only affect the recruits from rituals. If you want more control I recommend Xenotype Spawn Control by bradson
Should be compatible with most mods.
